definition: (interjection expressing surprise, grief etc)/variant of 嘻[xi1]
(interjection expressing surprise, grief etc)/variant of 嘻[xi1]

sentences.english: As if , write so much , itself just as a article , Xixi…
sentences.chinese: 好像，写了这么多，本身就是一篇文章了哦，嘻嘻。

sentences.english: Hedgehog heard the grass move , It was snake.
sentences.chinese: 刺猬听到草嘻嘻索索的声音，蛇出现了。
他现在又开始嘻嘻哈哈了。

sentences.english: She smiled, and said how she had changed her name since she was in these parts.
sentences.chinese: 她笑嘻嘻地对我说，她一到了这块地方就改名换姓了。

sentences.english: Refer a meter has been used, but the great cattle Seoul Eye drops Yo, hehe.
sentences.chinese: 介个米有用过，但是牛尔滴眼霜很棒呦，嘻嘻。

sentences.english: Yes I can, but my computer can't write in chinese.
sentences.chinese: 是的，刚打完，球童给照的。你能讲中文吗？嘻嘻。

sentences.english: You looked at the grinning , I will be satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 看着笑嘻嘻的你们，我也就心满意足了。

sentences.english: The poor children laugh and play in the street.
sentences.chinese: 穷苦的小孩开始在街上嘻嘻哈哈地玩了。

sentences.english: Kusukusu comments that Rima dislike being call cute and that she wants to make people laugh.
sentences.chinese: 嘻嘻觉得璃茉讨厌别人说她可爱但她要让人发笑。

sentences.english: With withered leaves they weave their boats and smilingly float them on the vast deepsea.
sentences.chinese: 他们把落叶编成了船，笑嘻嘻地把它们放到大海上。

sentences.english: And smil'd among the winter's snow.
sentences.chinese: 我在冬天的雪地里也总是笑嘻嘻。

sentences.english: He simply laughed off the embarrassing situation in which he had found himself.
sentences.chinese: 他嘻嘻哈哈地就把他的尴尬处境应付过去了。

sentences.english: Lily grinned and wriggled away from her mother.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉笑嘻嘻的从她妈妈那里挣扎出来。

definition: (interjection expressing surprise, grief etc)/variant of 嘻[xi1]
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
abbr. for 哈薩克斯坦|哈萨克斯坦[Ha1 sa4 ke4 si1 tan3], Kazakhstan/abbr. for 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Harbin
(interj.) ha!/(onom. for laughter)/(slang) to be infatuated with/to adore/abbr. for 哈士奇[ha1 shi4 qi2], husky (dog)
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
(onom.) sound of muffled laughter (chuckling, tittering etc)/sound of stammering
